using namespace std;
#include<set>
#include<climits>
#include<algorithm>
#include<utility>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cctype>
#include<queue>
#include<sstream>
#define read(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define write(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define assign(x,n) x=(int*)calloc(n,4)
#define rep(i,n) for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
#define max(a,b) ((a)>(b))?(a):(b)
#include<vector>
typedef  long long int ull;
 

 
 
int main()
{
	
  int t,n,i,j,k;
  read(t);
  while(t--)
  {
  	
    read(n);
    int v[1001];
      for(i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
      	read(v[i]);
      	//v.push_back(j);
      }
 
 
    int ans=1;
    int l[1001]={1,0};
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
               {
               
               for(j=k=0;j<i;j++)
			   if(v[j]<=v[i] && l[j]>k)k=l[j];
               l[i]=k+1;  
               if(l[i]>ans)ans=l[i];
               }  
       write(ans);
       
}
 
return 0;
}
